title: Mechanism and toxicity assessment of carbofuran degradation by persulfate-based advanced oxidation process
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30582-30589
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05365F, Paper

Chenxi Zhang, Youxin Xu, Bingbing Chu, Xiaomin Sun
The advanced oxidation process based on persulfate has been proven to be a promising method for degrading the highly toxic carbamate pesticide carbofuran (CBF).
